name: gibet
description: An opinionated (i.e. decidedly eccentric) "scaffold"/example for F# web-app development using Fable, Elmish, Fulma / Bulma, Fable.Remoting, Elmish.Bridge, Giraffe and ASP.NET Core. https://gibet.azurewebsites.net/
author: dj narration
// dependencies:bulma: pinned to 0.7.4 because 0.7.5+ seem to cause problems with navbar drop-down/s in MS Edge
// dependencies:bulma-pageloader: pinned to 2.1.0 because 2.2.0 causes a "This selector doesn't have any properties" warning
// dependencies:bulma-tooltip: pinned to 2.0.2 (and Fulma.Extensions.Wikiki.Tooltip pinned to 2.0.1) as 3.0.2 seems not to work
